name: @ismail-elkorchi/ui-tokens
description: CSS design tokens packaged as reusable variables for any UI.
author: Ismail El Korchi

scripts.build: npm run clean && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('dist', {recursive: true}); ['index.css', 'theme.css'].forEach(file => fs.copyFileSync(file, 'dist/' + file));"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true});"
